title: Business Office Associate Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Covenant Living Communities & Services (Chicago, IL)
Interview Descriptions: They do a phone interview and then 2 more interviews in person. One is zoom and one in person at the location. Everyone is very nice and welcoming throughout the whole ordeal and communication was immaculate
Interview Questions: How did you handle a tough situation and what steps did you take?

title: Hospitality Aide Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Covenant Living Communities & Services
Interview Descriptions: The phone interview was informal and just added a few more details about the job. The interviewer was transparent about them being desperate for employees. The interviewer then asked me to come in person.
Interview Questions: What skills apply to the job?

title: Director of Nursing Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Covenant Living Communities & Services (Minneapolis, MN) in Jul 2021
Interview Descriptions: Was phoned by HR and was scheduled after working hours for an interview. Meeting was with HR, Interim DON, former DON and ED. Extremely pleasant and respectful; amount of time spent was an hour.
Interview Questions: Multiple strong questions that encouraged broad scope and specific answers.

title: Diet Aide Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Covenant Living Communities & Services
Interview Descriptions: It was an easy interview, basic questions, basic scenarios questions. One interview with HR lady and then another interview with the department supervisor. Then wait for background check and physical.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Marketing Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Covenant Living Communities & Services
Interview Descriptions: I applied online - the application process was easy and didn't take more than ten minutes. The interview process was smooth and straight-forward. Overall, the application and interview process was a great experience and I am very happy to be a part of the team!
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in a career at Covenant Living?

title: Digital Marketing Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Covenant Living Communities & Services in May 2020
Interview Descriptions: I had an initial call with a recruiter that shared an overview of the company and the team I would be working with. I was asked to have a second call with two members of the marketing team which went well. There was a bit of a delay in terms of communication about final steps and a potential offer. After I was offered the position, someone on the team also had a call with me to make sure I would feel comfortable coming into the office certain days of the week and the social distancing guidelines their office followed. I really appreciated the call and I've enjoyed working here!
Interview Questions: What is a time when you made a mistake at work and how did you handle it?

title: Human Resources Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Covenant Living Communities & Services (Hartford, CT)
Interview Descriptions: I received a call from an outside recruiter.  She informed me that I would be asked about my religious beliefs during an in-person interview.  Needless to say, I withdrew my candidacy. Their practices are illegal and discriminatory.
Interview Questions: The interview process will consist of a discussion on your religious beliefs.

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Covenant Living Communities & Services (Spring Valley, CA) in Mar 2018
Interview Descriptions: Unprofessional! Only asked me two questions during both interviews. They spent most of the interview singing the praises of the person who you would be replacing. The manager of the person who you would be reporting to gave his notice  quit during the interview process. As did another member of the team. Red flag! I was told they would call me back to let me know if I did or did not get the position and they never did. They did not keep any of their own deadlines to move on in the process.They were all friendly just unprofessional.
Interview Questions: What was your favorite position and why?

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 6 days. I interviewed at Covenant Living Communities & Services (Walker, MI)
Interview Descriptions:
Emailed to set up phone interview.
Phone interview with HR director and then in person interveiw with HR director and Director of Nursing 
They told me I had the job after the interview but knew I had other offers and to let them know my decision. I took the offer and scheduled orientation for a few weeks from that time.
Interview Questions: What is one thing you would do more of, less of, and just the same of?

title: Management Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Covenant Living Communities & Services (Turlock, CA) in Apr 2017
Interview Descriptions: Submit application online, phone call, interview.    Manger from department confers with others and makes a decision if your  qualified for the position and then asks HR to submit an offer letter

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Covenant Living Communities & Services (Golden Valley, MN) in Oct 2016
Interview Descriptions: Interviewer was professional, friendly, and on time.  Some paperwork did repeat from their online application.  Tour of the facility was nice, staff and residents seemed happy.  Facility is easy to get to from the twin cities.  Received a follow up offer less than a week after interview.  Overall a nice experience and would recommend.
Interview Questions: What was a stressful situation in a past job?

title: Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Covenant Living Communities & Services (Turlock, CA) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: Their very slow process, the people that was at the interview wasn't impressive. Well tell you what a great company it is, maybe for the first couple of months, ans then its down hill from there.
Interview Questions: Most of the questions didn't make to much sense.

title: Charge Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Covenant Living Communities & Services (Turlock, CA) in Sept 2015
Interview Descriptions: Brandel Manors interview process is like a panel interview. The Director of Nurses, the assistant director, the Director of Staff development, one of the therapists, and someone from social services will take turns asking you questions ranging from where you went to school, plans for future and scenario type wuestions in relation to patient care.
Interview Questions: What if questions were asked. Also asked was if I was aware of the chain of command and the 5 rights of medication administration.

title: Director of Clinical Services Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 months. I interviewed at Covenant Living Communities & Services
Interview Descriptions: Very Loose and unstructured. No questions supplied to panel, no structure to who spoke or what direction the questioning went. Felt very disjointed and un-professional except for the office manager. She was on the ball, and did a great job,
Interview Questions: Is it necessary to operate per Home Care Regulations

title: Dietary Aide Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Covenant Living Communities & Services (Northbrook, IL) in Oct 2013
Interview Descriptions: A couple easy questions.  They asked very easy questions and it seemed like they would hire anyone since they were always short on staff.  You were almost guaranteed to be hired if you applied.
Interview Questions: How did I hear about this job?
